snippet.title: Peripeteia Trailer: Revealed
snippet.description:
Proudly presented by Ninth Exodus with music by the exceptional Sewerslvt!

Peripeteia is an upcoming indie cyberpunk Action RPG in the vain of classics such as Deus Ex, System Shock, and  other 0451 games. We proudly present here our trailer original made for the /v/3 event. 

You play as Marie, a cyber soldier in an invisible war beneath the noise skies of Neo-Poland. 
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1437760
Twitter: https://twitter.com/90sGraphics
Discord: https://discord.gg/2Rs5nydSH3
